data.name: Code BEAM SF
data.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.

relatedRecords.name: Austin API Summit

Attend the conference to discover new trends, explore different technologies, and pick up pro tips to bring back to your own projects. We will ve deep into API strategy and related topics. relatedRecords.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
relatedRecords.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.

relatedRecords.name: Into The Box 2020
relatedRecords.description: Into the Box is a yearly web technologies and software craftsmanship conference. We welcome you this May 1st to the 3rd, 2019 in Houston, Texas!
